content: **wilbur sweater ladies** sweater worked from neck down in tweed recycled beg to cast on sts for sleeves and the back then increase for neck and raglan at the same time work diagram with cables divide work for sleeves back and front work back and front in rnds with cables at back and front with p sts between and end with ribbing work sleeves in rnds with cables and p sts end with ribbing work neckband in ribbing and fold double to ws **difficulty** **** experienced available in norwegian here 1 available in german here 2 available in english here 3 1 https //www sandnes-garn se/mpattachment/file/download/id/13229/ 2 https //www sandnes-garn se/mpattachment/file/download/id/13262/ 3 https //www sandnes-garn se/mpattachment/file/download/id/13259/
